_comment: Self-Streme Egg, v5 - Standard Installation Flow (single-line script)
name: Self-Streme
author: zvielkoren@github.com
description: A powerful self-hosted streaming server with Stremio integration. This egg clones the repository and installs dependencies before starting.

installation.script:
#!/bin/bash

cd /mnt/server/

apt update
apt install -y git curl

GITHUB_REPO="https://github.com/zvielkoren/self-streme.git"
BRANCH="main"

if [ ! -d .git ]; then
    echo "Cloning repository..."
    git clone --single-branch --branch ${BRANCH} ${GITHUB_REPO} .
else
    echo "Repository exists, updating..."
    git fetch origin
    git reset --hard origin/${BRANCH}
fi

echo "Installing dependencies..."
npm ci --only=production

mkdir -p media temp

echo "Installation complete! Server is ready to start."

variables.name: Torrent Port
variables.description: Port for incoming P2P connections (TCP/UDP). Must be allocated as an additional port in the panel.

variables.name: Base URL
variables.description: The public URL for accessing Self-Streme (e.g., https://your-domain.com). Leave empty for auto-detection.

variables.name: Cloudflare Tunnel Token
variables.description: Optional Cloudflare Tunnel token for exposing the server.
